A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One star for the CGI and actors who had to show up daily in order to deal with the embarrassment of being in a high school play. Plot holes everywhere. It can be summed up as a director/writer having the ability of taking the story from TFA and just passing the buck off to the writers of IX to make something of this turd. I've seen all the SW franchise in the theaters\, bought the books old and new. This one will not make it to my rental or movie queue and gives me pause to actually going to see IX in the theaters.
